hadiths.text: Narrated `Isa bin Talha:that he had heard Muawiya repeating the words of Adhan up to "Wa ash-hadu anna Muhammadan rasulul-lah (and I testify that Muhammad is Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا سَمِعَ الْمُنَادِي
chapter.eng-name: What to say on hearing the Adhan
